      • renderTooltip

        public void renderTooltip(net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player.ItemTooltipEvent event)

      • animatedText

        public static java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> animatedText(java.lang.String text,
                                                                         int step,
                                                                         int delay,
                                                                         java.lang.String... formats)
        Create an animated text, this method taken and adapted from GT:NH modpack team's fork mod Avaritia, please see line 19 at fox/spiteful/avaritia/LudicrousText.java.
        参数:
        text - The text to be animated.
        step - The steps formats is shifted each delay.
        delay - The milliseconds which between each shift of formats.
        formats - An array of formatting codes. Each char of text will be prefixed by one entry, depending on step and delay. Wraps around, if shorter than formats.
        返回:
        An animated text with properties.

      • animatedText

        public static java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> animatedText(java.lang.String format,
                                                                         java.lang.Object[] args,
                                                                         int step,
                                                                         int delay,
                                                                         java.lang.String... formats)
        Create a formatted and animated text, this method taken and adapted from GT:NH modpack team's fork mod Avaritia, please see line 19 at fox/spiteful/avaritia/LudicrousText.java.
        参数:
        format - The text to be formatted and animated.
        args - The formatting arguments.
        step - The steps formats is shifted each delay.
        delay - The milliseconds which between each shift of formats.
        formats - An array of formatting codes. Each char of text will be prefixed by one entry, depending on step and delay. Wraps around, if shorter than formats.
        返回:
        A formatted and animated text with properties.

      • translatedAnimatedText

        public static java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> translatedAnimatedText(java.lang.String translationKey,
                                                                                   int step,
                                                                                   int delay,
                                                                                   java.lang.String... formats)
        Create a translated and animated text, this method taken and adapted from GT:NH modpack fork mod Avaritia, please see line 19 at fox/spiteful/avaritia/LudicrousText.java.
        参数:
        translationKey - The key used to look up the translation.
        step - The steps formats is shifted each delay.
        delay - The milliseconds which between each shift of formats.
        formats - An array of formatting codes. Each char of text will be prefixed by one entry, depending on step and delay. Wraps around, if shorter than formats.
        返回:
        A translated and animated text with properties.

      • translatedAnimatedText

        public static java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> translatedAnimatedText(java.lang.String translationKey,
                                                                                   java.lang.Object[] args,
                                                                                   int step,
                                                                                   int delay,
                                                                                   java.lang.String... formats)
        Create a translated, formatted and animated text, this method taken and adapted from GT:NH modpack fork mod Avaritia, please see line 19 at fox/spiteful/avaritia/LudicrousText.java.
        参数:
        translationKey - The key used to look up the translation.
        args - The formatting arguments.
        step - The steps formats is shifted each delay.
        delay - The milliseconds which between each shift of formats.
        formats - An array of formatting codes. Each char of text will be prefixed by one entry, depending on step and delay. Wraps around, if shorter than formats.
        返回:
        A translated and animated text with properties.

      • addOreDictTooltip

        public static void addOreDictTooltip(java.lang.String oreDictName,
                                     java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> tooltip)
        Add static tooltip to all items with oreDictName, this method is useful for some grouped items like Gregtech materials.

        Should use static text (FormattingUtility#text) in tooltip.

        The items must be registered in the OreDictionary when this method is called, and items with equal registry name and meta but different NBT are considered equal.

        参数:
        oreDictName - Ore Dictionary name.
        tooltip - Static string supplier.

      • addItemTooltip

        public static void addItemTooltip(java.lang.String modId,
                                  java.lang.String name,
                                  int meta,
                                  java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> tooltip)
        Add tooltip to specific item with modId, name and meta.

        For default, if modId is null, then will search name and meta in the mod.

        Should use static text (FormattingUtility#text) in tooltip.

        参数:
        modId - The mod Id.
        name - The item name.
        meta - The item meta.
        tooltip - Static string supplier.

      • addItemTooltip

        public static void addItemTooltip(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack item,
                                  java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> tooltip)
        Add tooltip to item.

        Items with equal registry name and meta but different NBT are considered equal, using OreDictionary.WILDCARD_VALUE or GTValues.W as meta is allowed.

        Should use static text (FormattingUtility#text) in tooltip.

        参数:
        item - The item stack.
        tooltip - Static string supplier.
